item.name: GET request to get all leads

request.description: This will return all leads that are saved in Data Base in json format.

item.name: GET request to get particular lead by ID

request.description:
This will return leads by particular id given in URL.

User need to give the id in URL as shown in below example.

Eg :-

http://localhost:5000/leads/1

returns lead whose id is 1.

http://localhost:5000/leads/2

returns lead whose id is 2.

item.name: POST request to add data to DB

request.description:
You can post data into DB.

This post request accepts only json format.

To use this request you need to choose raw under the body section and select type json to post data.

body -> raw -> json.

example:-

{

"email" : "[srk@gmail.com](mailto:srk@gmail.com)",

"Name" : "Siva Rama Krishna",

"Age" : 22,

}
